title: Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      The Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site is open Friday - Sunday, from 9am - 12noon and 1pm - 5pm.  The site is closed from 12noon - 1pm.It is located at 532 N. 7th Street, Philadelphia, PA 19123.
